Bash(python3 -c "
import requests

URL = ''https://aims-worldrunning.org/calendar.html''
HEADERS = {''User-Agent'': ''MarathonCrawler/1.0 \(contact@example.com\)''}
res = requests.get\(URL, headers=HEADERS, timeout=15\)
text = res.text

# div class 패턴 확인
import re
classes = re.findall\(r''class=[""\\'']\([^""\\'']*\)[""\\''\\'']'', text\)
# 고유한 class들
unique = sorted\(set\(classes\)\)
for c in unique:
    if ''event'' in c.lower\(\) or ''race'' in c.lower\(\) or ''calendar'' in c.lower\(\) or ''row'' in c.lower\(\) or ''month'' in c.lower\(\):
        print\(c\)
")
